title: HawkEye 360 announces $58 million funding round
summary: HawkEye 360, a commercial operator of remote-sensing satellites, announced July 13 it has raised $58 million in new funding.

title: Rocket Lab takes another step towards reusability on next Electron launch
summary: Rocket Lab’s next Electron launch will feature upgrades to the rocket that bring the company a step closer to being able to reuse its first stage.

title: NASA cancels Janus asteroid smallsat mission
summary: NASA has canceled a mission to send a pair of smallsats to binary asteroids and will put the nearly completed spacecraft into storage for a potential future opportunity.

title: FCC Nominees Win Committee Approval
summary: The Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation Committee approved the nominations of three FCC commissioners and the agency’s Inspector General today. The next stop is a confirmation vote by the full […]

title: Stunning Image Crowns JWST’s First Anniversary
summary: To celebrate the one-year anniversary of the first science-quality images from the James Webb Space Telescope, NASA and its JWST partners released a stunning image of a star-forming region 390 […]
